The '''Christmas tree customer''' is an unnamed character who wants to by a Christmas tree from [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]. He was portrayed by [[Gene Crane]] in "[[The One Where Rachel Quits]]".

While Joey explains to the customer the different kinds of trees he can buy, [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] comes with an old dead tree and tries to make the customer take it. She says that the trees which don't fulfill their Christmas destiny are thrown into the chipper. The customer is annoyed and walks away. Joey then tells Phoebe to stop scaring customers away because he works on commission.
